Mobile Originated and Mobile Release on live network using both SIM

CLIP test. Setup: Build 2G connection with DUT. Test: step 1: turn the CLIP off on the network simulator. step 2: call the DUT from network simulator. (No need to answer the call) step 3: check in the call logs of the DUT that the call number has not been displayed. step 4: turn the CLIP on on the network simulator. step 5: call the DUT from network simulator. (No need to answer the call) step 6: check in the DUT call logs that the call number has been displayed. WARNING: does not test if the *#30# call returns the right info.

CLIP test. Setup: Build 3G connection with DUT. Test: step 1: turn the CLIP off on the network simulator. step 2: call the DUT from network simulator. (No need to answer the call) step 3: check in the call logs of the DUT that the call number has not been displayed. step 4: turn the CLIP on on the network simulator. step 5: call the DUT from network simulator. (No need to answer the call) step 6: check in the DUT call logs that the call number has been displayed. WARNING: does not test if the *#30# call returns the right info.
Registration over LTE simulated network and then Ping
Live Cellular check of call details when private number is used.
IMS IR92 Voice Call

Parameter.name: IMS_REGISTRATION_OPERATION
Parameter.Description: Indicates the action to perform for IMS registration. REGISTER (perform IMS registration normally) or CHECK_ONLY (only check that the IMS status is REGISTERED).

Parameter.name: IMS_REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: The additional timeout for IMS registration.

Parameter.name: IMS_PARAMETER_FILE
Parameter.Description: The path to the IMS parameter file to use to create the IMS_Config.ini file on the device.

Parameter.name: IMS_PRECONDITIONS
Parameter.Description: The precondition parameters ("3gpp" with preconditions, "ietf" without preconditions).

Parameter.name: IMS_DIGEST_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: The DIGEST password to use when chosing DIGEST authentication mode.

Parameter.name: IP_VERSION
Parameter.Description: IP version used for the APN to connect to the C4I network. IPV4 | IPV6 | IPV4V6

UseCase.Description: IMS MO/MT Voice Call using two phones

Parameter.name: IMS_REGISTRATION_OPERATION
Parameter.Description: Indicates the action to perform for IMS registration. REGISTER (perform IMS registration normally) or CHECK_ONLY (only check that the IMS status is REGISTERED).

Parameter.name: IMS_REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: The additional timeout for IMS registration.

Parameter.name: IMS_PARAMETER_FILE
Parameter.Description: The path to the IMS parameter file to use to create the IMS_Config.ini file on the device.

Parameter.name: IMS_PRECONDITIONS
Parameter.Description: The precondition parameters ("3gpp" with preconditions, "ietf" without preconditions).

Parameter.name: IMS_DIGEST_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: The DIGEST password to use when chosing DIGEST authentication mode.

Parameter.name: IP_VERSION
Parameter.Description: IP version used for the APN to connect to the C4I network. IPV4 | IPV6 | IPV4V6

Parameter.name: CALL_DIRECTION
Parameter.Description: Mobile Originating or Mobile terminated call

Parameter.name: CALL_RELEASE
Parameter.Description: The parameters that controls who's releaseing the IMS voice call MR: Mobile Release NR: Network Release

Parameter.name: PHONE_NUMBER
Parameter.Description: The phone number to be called

Parameter.name: CALL_DURATION
Parameter.Description: Seconds to wait while call is establised

Parameter.name: CHECK_CALL_ON_HOLD_RESUME
Parameter.Description: Perform call on hold/resume procedure and checks the call status

Parameter.name: REMOTE_PARTY_ACTION
Parameter.Description: Remote party action regarding the call initiated by the main DUT - BUSY: The remote party will reject the call - NO_ANSWER: The remote party will not answer the call

Parameter.name: RINGING_TIME
Parameter.Description: The minimum ringing time to wait in seconds (defaults to 15s). This parameter is associated to the Remote Party Action: NO_ANSWER.

Parameter.name: FTP_TRANSFER
Parameter.Description: Perform FTP data transfer during IMS call

Parameter.name: FTP_DIRECTION
Parameter.Description: FTP data transfer direction: - DL: Download - UL: Upload - BOTH: Download and upload

Parameter.name: IP_VERSION
Parameter.Description: The IP version to use to connect to the mobile network. IPV4 | IPV6

Parameter.name: DL_FILENAME
Parameter.Description: File to download from the server. This file shall be available on the server. ACS gets its path value from BenchConfig using ftp_path key of SERVER equipments (WIFI_SERVER, LAB_SERVER...) If the file to transfer is located in an other specific directory, you can specify its path. i.e. : acs/download_file/get5M

Parameter.name: UL_FILENAME
Parameter.Description: File to upload on the server. This file shall be available on the device. ACS gets its path value from DeviceCatalog, BenchConfig or CLI using key ftpPath If the file to transfer is located in an other specific directory, you can specify its path. i.e. : acs/upload_file/put5M

Parameter.name: IMS_REGISTRATION_OPERATION
Parameter.Description: Indicates the action to perform for IMS registration. REGISTER (perform IMS registration normally) or CHECK_ONLY (only check that the IMS status is REGISTERED).

Parameter.name: IMS_REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: The additional timeout for IMS registration.

Parameter.name: IMS_PARAMETER_FILE
Parameter.Description: The path to the IMS parameter file to use to create the IMS_Config.ini file on the device.

Parameter.name: IMS_DIGEST_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: The DIGEST password to use when chosing DIGEST authentication mode.

Parameter.name: IMS_PRECONDITIONS
Parameter.Description: The precondition parameters ("3gpp" with preconditions, "ietf" without preconditions).

Parameter.name: SS_PHONE_NUMBER
Parameter.Description: The phone number used for Supplementary Service

UseCase.Description: Live Voice Call and SMS test while DUT is in Flight Mode
Identification of LTE IMS IR94 video Call and IR92 IR94 transition using two phones setup

Parameter.name: IMS_REGISTRATION_OPERATION
Parameter.Description: Indicates the action to perform for IMS registration. REGISTER (perform IMS registration normally) or CHECK_ONLY (only check that the IMS status is REGISTERED).

Parameter.name: IMS_REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: The additional timeout for IMS registration.

Parameter.name: IMS_PARAMETER_FILE
Parameter.Description: The path to the IMS parameter file to use to create the IMS_Config.ini file on the device.

Parameter.name: IMS_PRECONDITIONS
Parameter.Description: The precondition parameters ("3gpp" with preconditions, "ietf" without preconditions).

Parameter.name: IMS_DIGEST_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: The DIGEST password to use when choosing DIGEST authentication mode.

Parameter.name: IP_VERSION
Parameter.Description: IP version used for the APN to connect to the C4I network. IPV4 | IPV6 | IPV4V6

Parameter.name: CALL_DIRECTION
Parameter.Description: Mobile Originating or Mobile terminated call

Parameter.name: CALL_RELEASE
Parameter.Description: The parameters that controls who's releasing the IMS voice call MR: Mobile Release NR: Network Release

Parameter.name: PHONE_NUMBER
Parameter.Description: The phone number to be called

Parameter.name: CALL_DURATION
Parameter.Description: Seconds to wait while call is established

Parameter.name: CALL_TRANSITION_DOWNGRADE
Parameter.Description: IR94 Call transition, video downgrade to audio call

Parameter.name: REMOTE_PARTY_ACTION
Parameter.Description: Remote party action regarding the call initiated by the main DUT - BUSY: The remote party will reject the call - NO_ANSWER: The remote party will not answer the call

Parameter.name: RINGING_TIME
Parameter.Description: The minimum ringing time to wait in seconds (defaults to 15s). This parameter is associated to the Remote Party Action: NO_ANSWER.
